title: On the stability of radical functional equation in modular space
abstract:
In this work, we prove the generalised Hyer Ulam stability of the following
functional equation \begin{equation}\label{Eq-1} \phi(x)+\phi(y)+\phi(z)=q
\phi\left(\sqrt[s]{\frac{x^s+y^s+z^s}{q}}\right),\qquad |q| \leq 1
\end{equation} and $s$ is an odd integer such that $s\geq 3$, in modular space,
using the direct method, and the fixed point theorem.
